# `MergeContactsRequest` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| contactIds | `string[]` | Yes | The IDs of all contacts involved in the merge operation (must be between 2 and 25). |
| valueOverride | [`ExternalContact`](externalcontact-definition.md) | No | Override data to set for specific Contact fields after a merge. Any null fields in `valueOverride` will not replace existing data. |
